scopeNote: Use for personal principles of behaviour. For work styles that can affect how well someone performs a job use attitudes and values.
description: Principles or standards of behaviour, revealing one's judgement of what is important in life.

scopeNote: Use for describing behaviour which can be learned, improved and assessed. Do not use for labelling people's character.
description: Individual work styles, preferences and work-related beliefs that underpin behaviour so that knowledge and skills are applied effectively.
Ability to engage effectively and in a goal-directed manner with other people encountered at work or study, e.g. with colleagues, peers, customers, clients and patients.
